title: 2 Ways to Change the Default Print Size on Mac

steps.title: Click System Preferences.
steps.content: Click System Preferences . If a submenu opens instead, click the Show All button at the top of the window.

steps.title: Click the Default Paper Size menu.
steps.content: Click the Default Paper Size menu.

steps.title: Click the paper size that you want to set as default.
steps.content: Click the paper size that you want to set as default.

steps.title: Click the File menu in any app that can print.
steps.content: Click the File menu in any app that can print. You'll need to open the system Print window to set a custom paper size.

steps.title: Type a name for the custom size.
steps.content: Type a name for the custom size.

steps.title: Select your new size using the method above.
steps.content: Select your new size using the method above. Your new custom size will appear at the bottom of the Default Paper Size menu.
